00025 
00026 void ldmx::PhotonuclearXsecBiasingPlugin::beginRun(const G4Run*) {
00027 
00028     // Get the process manager associated with reactions involving photons.
00029     G4ProcessManager* pm = G4Gamma::GammaDefinition()->GetProcessManager();
00030 
00031     // Get the list of available processes.
00032     G4ProcessVector* processes = pm->GetProcessList();
00033 
00034     // Bias the photonuclear process by the user specified factor.
00035     for (int processIndex = 0; processIndex < processes->entries(); processIndex++) {
00036 
00037         G4VProcess* process = (*processes)[processIndex];
00038 
00039         if (process->GetProcessName().compareTo("photonNuclear") == 0) {
00040 
00041             ((G4HadronicProcess*) process)->BiasCrossSectionByFactor(xsecBiasingFactor_);
00042 
00043             std::cout << "[ PhotonuclearXsecBiasingPlugin ]: " << "Photonuclear xsec has increased by a factor of " << xsecBiasingFactor_ << std::endl;
00044         }
00045     }
00046 }
